title: Verification of your "Passeport Talent" application file by ISSO before submitting it on the national platform
description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes to all PhD students, researchers and their families doing research at UGA or in one of our partner institutions in Grenoble and Valence.

Important

I. You cannot submit a residence permit application directly through this form. It is only intended for the verification of your application file by ISSO before submitting it on the national platform. The procedure is detailed on our website: https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/getting-organized/ Section visas and residence permits
II. The validation of your file by ISSO does not guarantee it will be approved by the Prefecture.
III. Please refer to the complete list of required documents, available either on the national online application system or on the UGA international website.

Once you complete the form, ISSO will give you a feedback within a week (on average).
The information you provide in filling out this questionnaire will be saved electronically only for the time needed to review your documents, and will be treated as strictly confidential. Only staff members from UGA department of International Affairs (DGD DIT) will be able to access your documents. No information will be communicated to anyone outside of the university. If you wish to exercise your rights within the framework of the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation, you can make a request by contacting: isso@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr.
zones: Ministère de l'Enseignement supérieur et de la Recherche

champDescriptors.label: Before you start
champDescriptors.description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes.

> You cannot submit a residence permit application to the Préfecture directly through this form, it is only intended to check your documents 
prior to your online application on the national platform.

> The validation of your file by ISSO doesn't guarantee its acceptance by the Isère Préfecture.

> Only for the following requests will be considered : "Passeport Talent Chercheur", "Passeport Talent Familles". Others applications (salarié, réfugié, etc.) will not be reviewed.

> The list of all required documents is available on :
* The national online application platform https://administration-etrangers-en-france.interieur.gouv.fr/particuliers/#/
* UGA international website (only if you cannot access the online application): https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr > Getting organized > Visas & residence permits

champDescriptors.label: Your status
options: Spouse of a PhD student / researcher

champDescriptors.label: Your university / institution
options: Grenoble INP, Institut d'ingénierie et de management

champDescriptors.label: Expiration date of your current visa or residence permit
Please note
champDescriptors.description: Documents written in a language other than French must be translated by a sworn translator accredited by French courts.

champDescriptors.label: Passport
champDescriptors.description: Identity page (if it is your first residence permit card application, add all the pages containing entry stamps in the Schengen Area and other visas)

champDescriptors.label: Current residence permit card or long stay visa
ID photos
champDescriptors.description:
ISSO does not check your ID photos.
If you submit your application online, you will need to provide an "E-Photo": https://permisdeconduire.ants.gouv.fr/Services-associes/Ou-faire-ma-photo-et-ma-signature-numerisee
Otherwise, you photos must correspond to the 35 mm x 45 mm format – ISO/IEC 19794 – 5 : 2005 standard.

champDescriptors.label: Proof of address
champDescriptors.description: Dated less than 6 months and in your name, or, if you are hosted, in the name of the person hosting you. Documents accepted: * Electricity, gas, water, phone or Internet bill * House insurance certificate "Attestation d’assurance habitation" * Certificate from a student residence "Attestation de residence" * Rental contract "Bail" * Rent receipt or bill * Attestation from a hotel (only dated less than a month) along with the last bill.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone
champDescriptors.description:
« Attestation d’hébergement » form, filled in and signed by the person hosting you.
A template is provided on UGA International website.

champDescriptors.label: If you are hosted by someone [2]
champDescriptors.description: Valid French/European ID, or residence permit card (the address must be up to date), of the person hosting you.

champDescriptors.label: If you apply for a residence permit "Passeport Talent - Chercheur"
If it is your first application as "Passeport Talent - Chercheur"
champDescriptors.description: Highest diploma obtained, in France or abroad: master's degree or equivalent, doctoral degree

champDescriptors.label: If you are enrolled in "Pôle Emploi" and still unemployed
champDescriptors.description: The statement of the "ARE" rights (document issued by Pole Emploi indicating the number of days during which you will receive an allowance).

champDescriptors.label: If you apply for a residence permit as a spouse of researcher
Current residence permit / visa of your spouse
Comments (optional)
champDescriptors.description: Anything you would like to tell us about your application file or your situation?

champDescriptors.label: Done!
champDescriptors.description: After submitting your application, you will receive a first automatic email. About a week later, ISSO will contact you through this platform in order to tell you if your application file is complete, and if so, to make an appointement in order for you to bring your documents.
